items.name: The Traditional Hammam: An Ancestral Ritual
items.desc: Enjoy the purifying benefits of the Moroccan hammam. Under the gentle warmth of the steam, let your tensions melt away and your skin regain its radiance and softness. Our treatments include an exfoliation with black soap for a true moment of rejuvenation.

items.desc: When booking your appointment, please inform us of any health issues, such as high blood pressure, allergies, as well as any pregnancy or other health concerns.
